title: [1.6.4-1.8.8] [ssp/smp] [汉化] [永久更新] Squeedometer 速度实测表[HAYO]
txt_content:

下载地址（不用翻墙）

v1.0.0-v1.0.3 (for Minecraft 1.6.4/1.7.x/1.8.x)

下载不了的点这个（个人汉化）←未经允许，不得转载发布！

搬运日志
2016.01.15搬运1.6.4-1.8.8
2016.01.22汉化全部版本
更新日志
v1.0.3 (December 17, 2015)- Made the 1.8 version work on 1.8.8 as well 
v1.0.3 (April 19, 2015)- Added a version for Minecraft 1.8 courtesy of ChrisLane 
v1.0.3 (January 6, 2015)- Fixed config comment for speedUnit showing the wrong code for meters/sec- Added French localization (thanks AegisLesha)Previous Versions (click to hide) 
v1.0.2 (August 14, 2014)- Added a 1.7.x version- Added support for the Version Checker mod (1.7.x only)- Fixed 'minimal' unit display defaulting to on (was meant to be false)- Fixed meters/sec accidentally showing meters/tick 
v1.0.1 (August 14, 2014)- Added 'Show Units' setting (can be set to on, minimal, or off)- Added 'Precision' setting- Decreased default precision from 4 to 2- Added the last jump info floating text option to the settings screen 
v1.0.0 (August 13, 2014)- Initial release



给人气呗（m20c）
